means: 无忧无虑的，漠不关心的

sentence.Network_en: Programme-makers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 编程者似乎对大批量制造含暴力因素的产品处之漠然，毫无责任心。

sentence.Network_en: His insouciant handling of the oil spill in the Gulf is under fire from all sides.
sentence.Network_cn: 他处理波斯湾漏油事件的漫不经心遭至各路讨伐。

sentence.Network_en: Or perhaps the insouciant Rue Saint - Denis , where French Montrealers go to see and be seen.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许是圣丹尼路上漫不经心的格调, 法裔蒙城人去那里欣赏别人和展示自己.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 黄颀课堂讲义单词 - 豆丁网 ... nonchalant 冷漠的 insouciant 漫不经心的 check 突然停止， 阻止.
蓝宝词典 ... insolent adj. 粗野的，无礼的 insouciant adj. 无忧无虑的 instate vt. 任命.

list.abs: ...各种奉承恭维的 obsequious subservient supple各种无忧无虑 carefree insouciant lighthearted各种小争吵，小战斗 skirmish miff tiff spat squabble.
英语学习资料收集 ... Cursory 草率的 Insouciance 漫不经心，无忧虑 Insouciant 漫不经心的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... arrogance 傲慢，自大 insouciance 漠不关心 radiance 发光，喜悦.

entry.tran: 漠不关心的;漫不经心的
entry.def: An insouciant action or quality shows someone's lack of concern about something which they might be expected to take more seriously.

example.ex: Programme-makers seem irresponsibly insouciant about churning out violence.
example.tran: 编程者似乎对大批量制造含暴力因素的产品处之漠然，毫无责任心。

sentences.sentence: "showed a casual disregard for cold weather"
"was polite in a teasing nonchalant manner"

auth_sentence.content: Norma...he had last seen wandering in insouciant nudity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Norma...he had last seen wandering in insouciant nudity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Norma...he had last seen wandering in insouciant nudity.

auth_sentence.content: She was actually leaping in the air, our insouciant Soapy!
auth_sentence.res_content: She was actually leaping in the air, our insouciant Soapy!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was actually leaping in the air, our insouciant Soapy!

auth_sentence.content: Vernon was extroverted, insouciant, a winning combination of gentleman and rake.
auth_sentence.res_content: Vernon was extroverted, insouciant, a winning combination of gentleman and rake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Vernon was extroverted, insouciant, a winning combination of gentleman and rake.
